attributes.comment:
On behalf of those adopting internationally, I vote to decline the increase at
USCIS. Adoption costs are escalating and the U.S. doesn't help in keeping those
costs at a minimun. We are already having to repeat Biometrics and refile/renew
the I600A form prior to finalization of referrals!!! So we are paying twice for
something that should only be done once! If the fees do go up, I would
recommend that if the forms have to be refiled before expiration then have a
nominal fee (not the original fee) to renew. Nominal fee meaning less than 1/2 of
the original fee.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
